docs.snippet: The engagement of Miss Marianne deWolfe Perry to Thomas Alexander Dewitt Bowman, son of Mr. and Mrs. Thomas Parker Bowman of New York and Brookfield, Conn., has been announced by the future bride's parents Mr. and Mrs. Alexander Perry Jr. of...
docs.lead_paragraph: The engagement of Miss Marianne deWolfe Perry to Thomas Alexander Dewitt Bowman, son of Mr. and Mrs. Thomas Parker Bowman of New York and Brookfield, Conn., has been announced by the future bride's parents Mr. and Mrs. Alexander Perry Jr. of Montevideo, Uruguay.

headline.main: Marianne Perry Will Be a Bride
